It is love at first sight for a jobless guy who is called Sharp by friends and family when he sees a college girl in a bus. He also helps her in an accident and tries to befriend her to win her love later. The girl reciprocates his friendship after knowing he was her accidental-helper but informs him she is arranged to be married to her cousin in 2 years. Sharp decides to woo her in 10 days and the spice on offer comes in the form of a rivalry he has with a linchpin of the girl's cousin in question.::PipingHotViews

This action comedy film is about a carefree youngster named Sharp aka _Vaalu_ (qv), who leads his life happily without worries or fear, falls in love with Priya at first sight when he sees her in the rain. Priya instantly reciprocates to his love while observing his good nature but informs Sharp about her parents decision to marry her off to her powerful businessman uncle who also happens to be a gangster. Will Sharp succeed in winning over Priya?::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
